results.title: Metformin Inhibits HaCaT Cell Proliferation Under Hyperlipidemia Through Reducing Reactive Oxygen Species via FOXO3 Activation
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ significantly promoted the autophagy and increase @GENE_FOXO3 @GENE_2309 @@@FOXO3@@@ protein level in the nucleus under @<m>DISEASE_Hyperlipidemias</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006949 @@@hyperlipidemia@@@.

citations.NLM: Zhang L, Liu X, Huang M, Wang R, Zhu W, Li Y, Shen L, Li C. Metformin Inhibits HaCaT Cell Proliferation Under Hyperlipidemia Through Reducing Reactive Oxygen Species via FOXO3 Activation Clin Cosmet Investig Dermatol. 2022;15():1403-1413. PMID: 35910506

results.title: Efficacy Confirmation Test of Black Cumin (Nigella sativa L.) Seeds Extract Using a High-Fat Diet Mouse Model
results.text_hl: The BCS extract at different doses (400-100 mg/kg) showed a dose-dependent improvement tendency in high-@CHEMICAL_Fats @CHEMICAL_MESH:D005223 @@@fat@@@ diet (HFD)-induced @DISEASE_Obesity @DISEASE_MESH:D009765 @@@obesity@@@, @DISEASE_Non_alcoholic_Fatty_Liver_Disease @DISEASE_MESH:D065626 @@@non-alcoholic fatty liver disease@@@ (@DISEASE_Non_alcoholic_Fatty_Liver_Disease @DISEASE_MESH:D065626 @@@NAFLD@@@), @<m>DISEASE_Hyperlipidemias</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006949 @@@hyperlipidemia@@@, and @DISEASE_Diabetic_Nephropathies @DISEASE_MESH:D003928 @@@diabetic nephropathy@@@ compared to the @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ (250 mg/kg).

citations.NLM: Bashir KMI, Kim JW, Kim JK, Chun YS, Choi JS, Ku SK. Efficacy Confirmation Test of Black Cumin (Nigella sativa L.) Seeds Extract Using a High-Fat Diet Mouse Model Metabolites. 2023 Mar 30;13(4):. PMID: 37110159

results.title: Long and Short-term Metformin Consumption as a Potential Therapy to Prevent Complications of COVID-19
results.text_hl: @SPECIES_9606 @@@Patients@@@ receiving @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ prior to the study were not matched for @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ dose and duration.

results.title: Sargassum fusiforme polysaccharide is a potential auxiliary substance for metformin in the management of diabetes.
results.text_hl: The results indicate that both @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ and LMET-SFP can attenuate body @DISEASE_Weight_Loss @DISEASE_MESH:D015431 @@@weight loss@@@ and ameliorate @DISEASE_Hyperglycemia @DISEASE_MESH:D006943 @@@hyperglycemia@@@, @DISEASE_Insulin_Resistance @DISEASE_MESH:D007333 @@@insulin resistance@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Hyperlipidemias</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006949 @@@hyperlipidemia@@@, and LMET-SFP exhibited better effects in lowering fasting blood @CHEMICAL_Glucose @CHEMICAL_MESH:D005947 @@@glucose@@@ levels, @DISEASE_Insulin_Resistance @DISEASE_MESH:D007333 @@@insulin resistance@@@ index and serum @CHEMICAL_Cholesterol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002784 @@@cholesterol@@@ compared to @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ only.

citations.NLM: Wu J, Jia RB, Luo D, Li ZR, Lin L, Zheng Q, Zhao M. Sargassum fusiforme polysaccharide is a potential auxiliary substance for metformin in the management of diabetes. Food Funct. 2022 Mar 7;13(5):3023-3035. PMID: 35199116
citations.BibTeX: @article{35199116, title={Sargassum fusiforme polysaccharide is a potential auxiliary substance for metformin in the management of diabetes.}, author={Wu J and Jia RB and Luo D and Li ZR and Lin L and Zheng Q and Zhao M}, journal={Food Funct}, volume={13}, number={5}, pages={3023-3035}}

results.title: Berberine is a potential alternative for metformin with good regulatory effect on lipids in treating metabolic diseases.
results.text_hl: We discovered that, although both two drugs had almost identical effects on reducing @DISEASE_Fatty_Liver @DISEASE_MESH:D005234 @@@fatty liver@@@, @DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammation@@@ and @DISEASE_Atherosclerosis @DISEASE_MESH:D050197 @@@atherosclerosis@@@, @CHEMICAL_Berberine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001599 @@@BBR@@@ appeared to be superior over @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@MTF@@@ in alleviating @<m>DISEASE_Hyperlipidemias</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006949 @@@hyperlipidemia@@@ and @DISEASE_Obesity @DISEASE_MESH:D009765 @@@obesity@@@, but @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@MTF@@@ was more effective than @CHEMICAL_Berberine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001599 @@@BBR@@@ for the control of @CHEMICAL_Blood_Glucose @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001786 @@@blood glucose@@@.

citations.NLM: Guo HH, Shen HR, Wang LL, Luo ZG, Zhang JL, Zhang HJ, Gao TL, Han YX, Jiang JD. Berberine is a potential alternative for metformin with good regulatory effect on lipids in treating metabolic diseases. Biomed Pharmacother. 2023 Jul;163():114754. PMID: 37094549
citations.BibTeX: @article{37094549, title={Berberine is a potential alternative for metformin with good regulatory effect on lipids in treating metabolic diseases.}, author={Guo HH and Shen HR and Wang LL and Luo ZG and Zhang JL and Zhang HJ and Gao TL and Han YX and Jiang JD}, journal={Biomed Pharmacother}, volume={163}, pages={114754}}

results.title: Impact of Endurance Exercise Training on Biomarkers of Aortic Endothelial Damage in Diabetic Rats.
results.text_hl: It seems that exercise along with taking @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ can be considered as a therapeutic method by improving @DISEASE_Hyperglycemia @DISEASE_MESH:D006943 @@@hyperglycemia@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Hyperlipidemias</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006949 @@@hyperlipidemia@@@ and reducing oxidative stress and vascular @DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammatory@@@ responses, leading to ameliorating biomarkers function related to @DISEASE_Vascular_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D014652 @@@endothelial damage@@@ in experimental @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetes@@@ conditions.

citations.NLM: Fouladi M, Mahmoudabady M, Gholamnezhad Z, Shabab S, Niazmand S, Salmani H. Impact of Endurance Exercise Training on Biomarkers of Aortic Endothelial Damage in Diabetic Rats. Cardiovasc Ther. 2024;2024():6025911. PMID: 39742025

results.title: Drug-Induced Subacute Cutaneous Lupus Erythematosus Associated with Fenofibrate Lipid Lowering Agent.
results.text_hl: Her medical conditions included @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetes mellitus@@@, @DISEASE_Vitamin_D_Deficiency @DISEASE_MESH:D014808 @@@vitamin D deficiency@@@, and @<m>DISEASE_Hyperlipidemias</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006949 @@@hyperlipidemia@@@. Her treatment for the past 4 years included @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, @CHEMICAL_saxagliptin @CHEMICAL_MESH:C502994 @@@saxagliptin@@@, @CHEMICAL_Atorvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069059 @@@atorvastatin@@@, @CHEMICAL_Vitamin_B_12 @CHEMICAL_MESH:D014805 @@@vitamin B12@@@, @CHEMICAL_Vitamin_D @CHEMICAL_MESH:D014807 @@@vitamin D@@@, @CHEMICAL_Lansoprazole @CHEMICAL_MESH:D064747 @@@lansoprazole@@@, and @CHEMICAL_Aspirin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001241 @@@aspirin@@@.

citations.NLM: Al-Qarqaz FA, Marji MM. Drug-Induced Subacute Cutaneous Lupus Erythematosus Associated with Fenofibrate Lipid Lowering Agent. Skinmed. 2024;22(6):472-474. PMID: 39871590

results.title: Hypoglycemic, Hypolipidemic and Antioxidant Potentials of Ethanolic Stem Bark Extract of Anacardium occidentale in Streptozotocin-Induced Diabetic Rats.
results.text_hl: Results showed that treatment with 200 and 400 mg/kg Anacardium occidentale stem bark extract reversed @DISEASE_Hyperglycemia @DISEASE_MESH:D006943 @@@hyperglycemia@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Hyperlipidemias</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006949 @@@hyperlipidemia@@@ induced by @CHEMICAL_Streptozocin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D013311 @@@STZ@@@ similar to what was observed with the standard drug, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@.

citations.NLM: Bamisaye FA, Ibrahim RA, Sulyman AO, Jubril AO, Ajuwon O. Hypoglycemic, Hypolipidemic and Antioxidant Potentials of Ethanolic Stem Bark Extract of Anacardium occidentale in Streptozotocin-Induced Diabetic Rats. Niger J Physiol Sci. 2022 Jun 30;37(1):137-145. PMID: 35947843
